resources.string: Get started by adding an app from the button below.
This feature needs Usage access. You have to enable access for this app through Settings. Tap "OK", and allow the permission for this app.
This feature needs Usage access. But your ROM does not support it. So, this feature will not work on your ROM.
Pause RapidBr when this app starts
Do not change brightness when this app starts
Set brightness to %d%% when this app starts
